protocol.name: P-GSE36887-1
text: ABS_CALL = indicating whether the transcript was present (P), absent (A), or marginal (M)

protocol.name: P-GSE36887-2
protocol.text: In DAG 6, final concentration 50 uM chemicals were added into the medium solution for chemical treatment. Seedlings collected before the chemicals added into the medium considered as the control sample. After chemicals added into the solution medium, samples were collected after designated time peroid (3 hour and 12 hour).

protocol.name: P-GSE36887-3
protocol.text: WT (Col-0) sown on 0.5x MS agar medium and stratified in the dark at 4 °C for 3 days and then germinated in the light condition (16 h light/8 h dark) for 5 days at 22 °C, and then transfer to the 0.5x MS solution one day for adapt the treatment condition.

protocol.name: P-GSE36887-4
protocol.text: Qiagen RNAeasy mini kit (Qiagen) was used for RNA preparation

protocol.name: P-GSE36887-5
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 10 ug total RNA (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, 701021 Rev. 5, Affymetrix).

protocol.name: P-GSE36887-6
protocol.text: Following fragmentation, 10 ug of cRNA were hybridized for 16.5 hr at 45C on GeneChip ATH1 Genome Array. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450.

protocol.name: P-GSE36887-7
protocol.text: The data were analyzed with Microarray Suite version 5.0 (MAS 5.0) using Affymetrix default analysis settings and global scaling as normalization method. The trimmed mean target intensity of each array was arbitrarily set to 500.
